snippet: The country’s oil regulator has estimated the auction of all 25 contracts on offer could ultimately attract about $1 billion in total investment.
lead_paragraph: The country’s oil regulator has estimated the auction of all 25 contracts on offer could ultimately attract about $1 billion in total investment.

headline.print_headline: Mexico Awards 14 Contracts For Onshore Oil Drilling
headline.main: Mexico Awards First 14 Contracts for Onshore Oil Drilling
